title: Ame-iro Cocoa Series: Ame-con!!
resume: Amami, the owner of the Rainy Color café, assigned Nozomu Tokura as the manager of the new shop in Hawaii.  Even though life of Nozomu is increasingly hectic toward the opening, he and his new fellows in Hawaii keep positive and make their efforts trying to get everything down. Can they make it by the date of opening?
